content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -11.5, 25.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
  
### Copper plate factory at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to offshore pump
- Ensure that the positions of the boiler and offshore pump are correctly aligned for the pipe connection. The current connection attempt failed due to incorrect positioning.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
